## What's Changed

* feat: Enhance Tags Analytics page with interactive features by @houdaslassi
  - Add search functionality to filter tags by name
  - Make tags clickable - navigate to filtered jobs page
  - Add sortable columns - click headers to sort by any metric
  - Add "Processing" column to show jobs currently processing
  - Visual sort indicators (↑↓↕) for better UX
